ppIntro: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how ChatJS ("we", "our", or "us") collects, uses, shares, and protects your personal information when you use our app and related services (the "Service").
ppInfoCollect: We collect the following types of information to provide and improve our Service:
ppAccountInfo: When you sign up, we collect information such as your username, email address, and other registration details.
ppMessages: Messages sent through the app are not encrypted. Messages can be accessed and read at any time. In addition, we can store metadata (e.g. timestamps, sender/receiver IDs) to support the functionality of the application.
ppUsageData: We collect information about how you interact with the app, such as app features used, crash logs, device type, and system information.
ppOptionalInfo: You may choose to provide additional details such as a profile picture or status message.
ppInfoUseList1: Provide, maintain, and improve the Service
ppInfoUseList2: Respond to customer inquiries and provide support
ppInfoUseList3: Analyze app usage to enhance user experience
ppInfoUseList4: Enforce our Terms of Service and prevent misuse
ppInfoShare: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share information only in the following situations:
ppInfoShareList1: With service providers: Trusted partners who help us operate and maintain the app (under strict confidentiality).
ppInfoShareList2: Legal compliance: When required by law, regulation, legal process, or governmental request.
ppInfoShareList3: Business transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction.
ppSecurity: We use industry-standard encryption, secure servers, and access controls to protect your data. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security.
ppRights: Depending on your location, you may have the right to:
ppRightsList1: Access and review the personal data we hold about you
ppRightsList2: Request correction or deletion of your information
ppRightsList3: Object to or restrict certain processing
ppRightsContact: To exercise these rights, contact us at support@chatjs.com.
ppRetention: We retain your information only as long as necessary to provide the Service and for legitimate legal and business purposes. When no longer needed, your data is securely deleted or anonymized.
ppChildren: ChatJS is not intended for users under the age of 14. We do not knowingly collect data from children. If you believe a child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately.
ppChanges: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make significant changes, we will notify you within the app or via email. Continued use of the Service after changes indicates your acceptance of the new policy.
